name: 邱家吉
objective: 本課程主要介紹工程應用上常見的數學方法，透過模擬解題與詮釋，使學生理解如何運用數學解決工程問題。課程內容包括(1)一階常微分方程式、(2)高階常微分方程式、(3)常微分方程式系統、(4)常微分方程式級數解、(5)Laplace轉換等章節，訓練同學在理論，計算及實驗間建立正確的認知及意義。
schedule:
Week 1 First order ODEs
Week 2 First order ODEs
Week 3 First order ODEs
Week 4 Second and higher order linear ODEs
Week 5 Second and higher order linear ODEs
Week 6 1st Midterm exam
Week 7 Second and higher order linear ODEs
Week 8 Second and higher order linear ODEs
Week 9 Second and higher order linear ODEs
Week 10 Systems of ODEs
Week 11 Systems of ODEs
Week 12 2nd Midterm exam
Week 13 Power series method
Week 14 Legendre’s equation
Week 15 Laplace transforms
Week 16 Laplace transforms
Week 17 Laplace transforms
Week 18 Final exam
scorePolicy: 第一次期中考 (20%)、第二次期中考 (20%)、期末考 (30%)、作業 (20%)、出缺席與平時表現 (10%)
materials: Kreyszig, E. (2011): Advanced engineering mathematics, 10th edition.
